title.value: Data Standards Wales Document Error Status

description.value: A set of codes used to clarify the status of a document entered-in-error within NHS Wales.

definition.value: A user has indicated that the document content does not relate to identified patient, but the misfile has not yet been confirmed. Care should be taken with regards the use and display of the document, which may have been seen and acted upon in a clinical environment.

It has been confirmed that the document content does not relate to identified patient. Care should be taken with regards the use and display of the document, which may have been seen and acted upon in a clinical environment.
The document is erroneous and should not be displayed in operational systems.
